name: Halloween Candy Reclaim
summary:
NEW! Local Multiplayer!

Play in your local network with up to four friends! Crossplay with PC/Steam! Shoot mobs and eat candy together... or take it all for yourself!

Spooky fun for the whole family - any time of the year!

Grab your pickle guns, climb on top of your candy-vacuuming, self-driving chariot, and clean the village of the candy-stealing mobs who have taken control! Take back insane amounts of candy, duck the suspect stuff they throw at you, and battle your way to the final boss!

Halloween...
